example.text: Balderson Fighting to Keep Woke Activists Away from Your Retirement Savings This helps ensure your pension fund is putting YOUR financial interests first... ? Balderson Fighting to Keep Woke Activists Away from Your Retirement Savings , Pension funds should be responsible for advancing the long-term financial interests of their investors, not the advancement of woke political agendas.

I'm proud to co-lead the bipartisan KEEP Telehealth Options Act to preserve access to critical telehealth services and break down barriers to care in rural communities. This is an important step toward ensuring that those in rural areas have the same access to care that those in urban areas do, and I look forward to continued, bipartisan work on this issue," said Representative Hinson .

The Jo Ann Davidson Institute has been a fantastic resource for Ohio’s emerging leaders and, in turn, the communities they serve. Pleased to welcome this year’s class to Capitol Hill today and provide an update on my legislation. ? ? [[url]]

The Chinese Communist Party - now in control of the world's largest petroleum reserve - received 900,000 barrels from the SPR to a Chinese government-controlled subsidiary. Yesterday, I spoke on the House Floor in support of HR 22 , which restores common sense by stopping the sale of our emergency stockpile to the CCP.
